name: granny twister cardigan
notes:
link above is to the english pattern. the pattern in danish is [here][1].

a wonderful and simple granny cardigan - perfect for the chilly days and summer nights.

it is crocheted in the well known granny pattern and is a perfect project for beginners. the cardigan is crocheted in twister and twister solid that exist in a whole range of beautiful colors. 
happy crocheting! 

materials:
- hobbii twister: 250g (1 skein)
- hobbii twister solid: 110g (2 skeins)
- crochet hook us 7 (4.5mm)

size: one size
measurement: 
the square measures approx. 40” x 40” (102x102 cm) before sewing.

abbreviations:
**ch**: chain
**st**: stitch
**sc**: single crochet
**hdc**: half double crochet 
**dc**: double crochet
**sl st**: slip stitch


  [1]: https://hobbii.dk/granny-twister-cardigan
